dmca.title: Agents Oracle Claims Copyright Over Database Entries
dmca.body:
Sender Information: 
Agents Oracle 
Sent by: Agents Data Base S.L.
[private]
[private] 
[private]
[private] 
Malaga, Spain

Fax:[private]

Recipient Information.
Google, Inc.
[private]
[private]
Mountain View, CA 94043

Fax: [private]

Sent via: Fax
Re: Digital Millennium Copyright Violation

Memorandum

To: Google

From: [private]
 
Date: 5/4/2004

I am the Managing Director for Agents Data Base S.L. (trading as Agents Oracle) and request removal of a number of sites that are providing and displaying copyrighted information that has been taken from our site and is being provided to them by a third party, http://www.slginmolink.com (Administrator-[private]. Email [private]@slgsolutions.com or [private]@spanish-living.com) 

We are a subscription based service which has been providing information to the real estate industry for more than 18 months. It has recently come to our attention that a rival service has been set up which has copied our information and is selling it to various companies. Verification of this infringement may involve access to both our system and to the system of www.slginmolink.com.

Access to the Agents Oracle system may be obtained by going to:  http://www.agentsoracle.com/[private]
and entering the password: [private]
Choosing
